snippet: Latanna Stone, the winner of more than 100 golf tournaments, hopes to play on the L.P.G.A. Tour one day. For now, the 10-year-old girl is content to be a standard setter for amateurs.
abstract: Latanna Stone, the winner of more than 100 golf tournaments, hopes to play on the LPGA Tour one day; for now, the 10-year-old girl is content to be a standard setter for amateurs.
lead_paragraph: Latanna Stone, the winner of more than 100 golf tournaments, hopes to play on the L.P.G.A. Tour one day. For now, the 10-year-old girl is content to be a standard setter for amateurs.

headline.seo: 10-Year-Old Latanna Stone Sets Standard for Amateur Golf
headline.main: Emerging Prodigy Amasses Trophies to Go With Her Toys
headline.print_headline: Emerging Prodigy Amasses Trophies To Go With Her Toys
